titleInfo.title: Bo Diddley at Vanderbilt's Alumni Lawn

mods.abstract: One color window card (green on white) announcing Bo Diddley, Jane His Wife, and Shaking Family at Vanderbilt's Alumni Lawn on April 7. Poster features metal photoplates of Bo Diddley and people dancing.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
